short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights the main content of an article to improve your reading skill and attention span!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you hate reading but want to read or enjoy reading? Try using this extension which will highlight an article/post in different color :D 

Disclaimer: This is my first browser extension project as a newbie and any feedbacks are welcome :D
